title: BRIEF-Gas South Acquires Natural Gas Marketing Operations In Florida From Peninsula Energy Services Company Inc
text:
BRIEF-Gas South Acquires Natural Gas Marketing Operations In Florida From Peninsula Energy Services Company Inc

Stock Markets 30 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 00:35)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Gas South Acquires Natural Gas Marketing Operations In Florida From Peninsula Energy Services Company Inc Oct 22 (Reuters) - Gas South: * GAS SOUTH ACQUIRES NATURAL GAS MARKETING OPERATIONS IN FLORIDA FROM PENINSULA ENERGY SERVICES COMPANY, INC. * GAS SOUTH- CO WILL BUY FLORIDA ASSETS OF PENINSULA ENERGY SERVICES COMPANY (PESCO), SUBSIDIARY OF CHESAPEAKE UTILITIES

BRIEF-Gas South Acquires Natural Gas Marketing Operations In Florida From Peninsula Energy Services Company Inc
